name: Different External Integrations - LLM vs Graph Database
description: Completely different external system integrations with different concerns

snippets.description: LLM integration with retry logic, prompt building, and response parsing for AI-based code analysis
Graph database atomic increment operation using Cypher queries for state management

notes: Completely different domains: External AI service integration with natural language prompts vs local graph database queries with Cypher. One deals with retry logic and text parsing, the other with atomic operations and type conversions.
